        public int getAliveNeighborCount(int x,
                        int y)
                          throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Description copied from interface: Board
        Returns the current number of alive neighbors of a specified cell. A cell is considered alive if CellState.alive is true.
        Specified by:
        getAliveNeighborCount in interface Board
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the specified cell
        y - The Y coordinate of the specified cell
        Returns:
        the number of alive neighbors
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the specified coordinates are outside of this board.

        states - The set of the specified CellStates

        the number of neighbors
